pr_title: Refactor time functions test out of giant ZetaSqlDialectSpecTest

timeline.message: Refactor time functions test out of giant ZetaSqlDialectSpecTest

timeline.bodyText: Can you explain the scope of this test class in the Javadoc comment? i.e. list the types covered (DATE, TIME, ...)
timeline.author: ibzib

replies.bodyText: Thanks for pointing this out. Updated several class comments.
replies.author: robinyqiu

timeline.bodyText: I know it isn't new, but this comment should be more descriptive. (Maybe Tests for ZetaSQL windowing functions (TUMBLE, HOP, and SESSION).)
timeline.author: ibzib
